titles.title: Disabled Veterans Insurance Improvement Act of 2005
Disabled Veterans Insurance Improvement Act of 2005
A bill to amend section 1922A of title 38, United States Code, to increase the amount of supplemental insurance available for totally disabled veterans.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.

bill.summary: Disabled Veterans Insurance Improvement Act of 2005 - Increases from $20,000 to $40,000 the maximum amount of supplemental service disabled veterans' insurance for totally disabled veterans.
